group_1.textRight: It was worth the wait!
Yeah...

group_1.textLeft: It's still a little far from being "a memory of@my visit to Kamihama"...

group_1.textRight: I see...
But in that case, we don't have any other options...
Hm?
That was...
Hinano!
Yeah, she has a lot of connections, she might@know something!
Heeey! Hinanoooo!
...Oh, it's Kanoko. And who's this?

group_1.textLeft: I'm Matsuri Hinata, nice to meet you!

group_1.textRight: That's some heavy luggage you've got there.

group_1.textLeft: Actually, a lot happened while I was hanging@out with Matsuri...

group_1.textRight: And you ended up carrying an air circulator@around... Just how did that happen?
I got it!
You gave a scrunchie to a maid who made a bet@with her senpai.
So she gave you a handmade air circulator@as thanks!

group_1.textLeft: That doesn't sound right...but not@completely wrong either...hmmm...

group_1.textRight: I don't know.
But maybe this meeting is fate.

group_1.textLeft: We've been thrown a bone, Myako-senpai!

group_1.textRight: Ahh...
In fact, I need an electric fan in tomorrow's@science class for the children.
But neither my house nor Emiri's has one.
We've just spent our budget and we're having@a hard time figuring out what to do.
And now, a fan pops up that'll totally@blow away our problem!
You made your decision quickly this time.

group_1.textLeft: I can't overlook someone in need.

group_1.textRight: Well, that's true.
A-are you sure?! We only need it for one class...
I did think it would be a waste of money to buy@a new fan, though...
Well, this really helps us, so I'll take you up@on that offer...

group_1.textLeft: I can even give you some material to go with it!

group_1.textRight: Material...?
.........[wait:0.8][chara:300301:lipSynch_1]It's...it's fine...@We'll pass on that...
However, it would be wrong if we don't give you@anything in return.
Yeah, I'd like to thank you...with this, if you@don't mind...
This is special dishwashing detergent that I@made in my chemistry class the other day.
Don't underestimate something just because@any kid could make it.
It's specially formulated for grease stains.

group_1.textLeft: Wow! That sounds like something amazing!@Thank you so much!

group_1.textRight: Oops, no time for this, we need to go prepare.
Okay, we'll be taking our leave now.
Have a fun time sightseeing Kamihama!
...Hold on, this isn't how it goes!@We're supposed to ask about our goal!
What is it?

group_1.textLeft: Well, do you have any recommendations for@somewhere we could eat taiyaki?

group_1.textRight: Taiyaki... You guys too...?@...Is it a fad after all...?
Well, some other Magical Girls were talking@about taiyaki...

group_1.textLeft: We should've taken the comedy material!

group_1.textRight: I don't want it.

group_1.textLeft: C'mooon, let's do ventriloquism or something!

group_1.textRight: I don't want to.
Now it's related to dining!

group_1.textLeft: Just what I'd expect from my one-time dummy!@Okay, on to the next place...

group_1.textRight: Nothing, I just thought that you can really@enjoy anything.
No... I think it's nice.

group_1.textLeft: I guess I can't stop myself from getting a little@excited...
